# Simple Data Processing Pipeline

A minimal Python project for computing statistics on CSV data.

## Structure

- `main.py` - Entry point, loads data and orchestrates pipeline
- `stats.py` - Statistics computation (mean, min, max, total)
- `report.py` - Report formatting

## Usage

```bash
python main.py
```

## Improvement Ideas

- Add median and standard deviation to stats
- Support multiple input formats (JSON, Excel)
- Add command-line arguments for input file
- Add data validation
